alert.note: Alert for Clayton; DeKalb; Fayette; Henry; Newton; Rockdale (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 9:35AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Rockdale, southern DeKalb, east central Fayette, Henry, Clayton and west central Newton Counties through 1000 AM EDT... At 935 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Jonesboro, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... McDonough, Conyers, Jonesboro, Stockbridge, Forest Park, Riverdale, Morrow, Lovejoy, Hapeville, Lake City, Hartsfield-Jackson Airport, Lake Spivey, Blacksville, Rex, Ola, Arabia Mountain, Hidden Valley Park, Flippen, Conley and Kelleytown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.

area.areaDesc: Clayton; DeKalb; Fayette; Henry; Newton; Rockdale
